data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Patty: This meeting looks like it will never end, doesn't it?
Kris: It ____ does. It's ____ a ____ thing ____ need ____ in ____ middle ____ a ____, ____ you ____ had ____ at ____ start ____ it!
Patty: Maybe we can find a way to keep the second half shorter than the first.
data.partBlankContent:
Patty: This meeting looks like it will never end, doesn't it?
Kris: It rea___ does. It's n__ a go__ thing t_ need cof___ in t__ middle o_ a mee____, wh__ you alr____ had so__ at t__ start o_ it!
Patty: Maybe we can find a way to keep the second half shorter than the first.
data.answer:
派蒂:这个会议看起来好像永远不会结束，不是吗?
克丽丝:确实如此。在会议开始时你已经喝了一些，但在会议中途需要咖啡可不是一件好事!
派蒂:也许我们可以想个办法让后半部分比前半部分短。
